text.en: Arise in the form of Parṇaśavarī, ‘Leaf Clad One’!
text.en-trans: ritrö loma gyön mé kur zheng shik

text.en: Do not abandon us, the people of this age of five degenerations,
text.en-trans: dakchak nyikma nga dö mi nam la

text.en: But care for us with your compassion.
text.en-trans: tukjé yalwar ma dor jesu zung

text.en: Carry out your incinerating activities to pacify, expel and destroy
text.en-trans: né rim yam né gowé né dukngal

text.en: Suffering caused by infectious disease, epidemics and plague!
text.en-trans: zhi dok zhom tu sekpé trinlé dzö
om pishatsi panashawa ri sarwa dzala tra sha ma ni soha
